WITH ORDEREDMEMBER AS ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_NAME, MEM_HP , MEM_MAIL, MEM_ADD1, MEM_MILEAGE , MEM_BIR FROM MEMBER
ORDER BY ROWID DESC ) A ) SELECT * FROM ORDEREDMEMBER WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

WITH CARTVIEW AS ( SELECT CART_MEMBER, CART_PROD, PROD_ID, PROD_NAME , PROD_PRICE , LPROD_NM "lprod.lprodNm" FROM CART INNER JOIN PROD ON (CART_PROD = PROD_ID) INNER JOIN LPROD ON (PROD_LGU = LPROD_GU) ) SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_PASS, MEM_NAME, MEM_REGNO1, MEM_REGNO2, MEM_BIR, MEM_ZIP, MEM_ADD1, MEM_ADD2, MEM_HOMETEL, MEM_COMTEL, MEM_HP, MEM_MAIL, MEM_JOB, MEM_LIKE, MEM_MEMORIAL, MEM_MEMORIALDAY, MEM_MILEAGE, MEM_DELETE , MEM_ROLE , MEM_IMG , CARTVIEW.* FROM MEMBER LEFT OUTER JOIN CARTVIEW ON (MEM_ID = CART_MEMBER) WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId}
mapper.delete: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_DELETE = '1' WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId}
